I am an entry-level software engineer with proven success in self-managed and team-based projects seeking to work with the software development life cycle and with object-oriented languages and functional programming. I am a native speaker of Mandarin with near-native fluency in English.

experience.title: CS/SE Grader
experience.description: I worked at Computer Science and Software Engineering department as a grader for CS1430 and CS3830. My responsibilities includes:
responsibilities: Assisting professor in grading labs and assignments.
Liaison between students and professor for programming questions.

experience.title: Internation Student Orientation Leader
experience.description: I worked at International Student & Scholar Services before and during orientation week. My responsibilities includes:
responsibilities: Organizing and documenting students' information for the ISSS office.
Ground working and arranging activities throughout the orientation week.
Facilitating new international students adjust to the United States and to college life.
